title: Scaffold Gradle multi-project (common/fabric/neoforge) with Loom + Vineflower
description: Create settings.gradle includes and root build.gradle applying Loom to subprojects, Vineflower decompiler, eclipse/idea plugins. Add minimal module build files and source/resource dirs.

title: Update configuration schema to spec
description: Define config fields: bot_token, guild_id, whitelist_role_id, admin_role_id, log_channel_id, application_message; provide default config file and load helpers in common.

title: Refactor onPlayerLogin into composable helpers
description: ArgusCore.onPlayerLogin (~200 lines) mixes cache sync, live role checks, bans, legacy handling, and audit logging, making behavior hard to reason/test. Extract pure helpers (e.g., name sync, live role reconcile, ban check, legacy kick decision, denial message builder) and reuse from join path to reduce duplication and improve testability.

title: Stabilize fabricRunSmoke to avoid hanging/timeout
Discord slash command dispatcher and reply helper
description: DiscordBridge duplicates boilerplate per subcommand and per reply. Add a tiny dispatcher map + shared replyEphemeral helper to collapse repetitive code in link/whitelist subcommands and centralize error handling.

title: Split moderation commands into /mod and add /reputation
description: Move moderation actions off /whitelist. New commands: /mod (admin-only) for warn, unwarn, ban, unban, comment, history, whois/lookup; /reputation for viewing reputations (no args = self view for anyone; with target requires admin). /reputation output: summary counts (active warnings/bans) + paged timeline; include warning and ban messages, timestamps, actors; include private comments only for admins. Comments hidden from users. /mod history: timeline of all moderation + whitelist/application events across users, filterable by event type, target user, actor, and timeframe; paged output. Remove old /whitelist warn/ban/unban/comment/review/my; keep /whitelist for link/whitelist/applications + admin whois. Update ARGUS_MASTER_SPEC.md and documentation book to match the new command surface and permission rules.

title: Expand login/auth tests for dry-run, live refresh, transient errors
Fix mdBook path in CI
description: Install mdBook in CI and call it from PATH instead of hardcoded ~/.local/bin.

title: Rewrite README and docs for new multi-loader layout
description: Update README, AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS where needed after multi-project split: new build/run commands, Javacord, cache-first rules.

title: NeoForge tokens list should include mcName
description: Fabric /argus tokens now prints mcName for active tokens; NeoForge listTokens prints only token/uuid/expiry. Update CommandReload.listTokens to include mcName when present for parity.

title: Strip signature files when shading Javacord to fix invalid signature digest
Batch cache saves off main/login threads
description: Current ArgusCore and DiscordBridge call CacheStore.save synchronously on login/join and audit/name/role events (e.g., ArgusCore.kt lines ~107,129,163,194,258; DiscordBridge.kt lines ~684,726,762), doing disk I/O on critical threads. Add a queued/batched writer (single background timer/dispatcher) and replace direct save calls with enqueue to avoid hitches while preserving .bak semantics.

title: Migrate version control workflow from jj to git
description: Beads git hooks expect git; stop recommending jj, ensure commits synced to git branch, document policy.

title: Increase :common login decision coverage
description: Add unit tests covering ArgusCore.onPlayerLogin/onPlayerJoin branches: active ban denial, missing Discord role (enforcement on/off), Discord down fallback (should defer to vanilla), legacy-whitelisted unlinked kick with /link token, dry-run logging vs enforcement, cache update when live role missing/present. Target ~65%+ line coverage for common.

title: Separate user vs dev docs in mdBook
description: Restructure mdBook SUMMARY into user guide vs development; move CI/Gradle info into development chapter; keep user-facing content focused on configuration/usage.

title: Ensure Discord role check error handling covered
description: Cover RoleStatus.Indeterminate path: Discord down/timeout should fall back to cache and not kick; assert audit/logging behavior for MissingRole/NotInGuild vs Indeterminate. Mock roleCheckOverride to simulate failures.

title: NeoForge entrypoint and metadata wiring to common
description: Add NeoForge mods.toml/metadata and entrypoint that forwards login/join to ArgusCore; ensure build works.

title: Implement cache and PlayerData JSON persistence with .bak safety
description: Implement argus_db.json manager: rename to .bak before save, fallback load from .bak, Map<UUID, PlayerData> with fields discordId, hasAccess, isAdmin, mcName, discordName, discordNick.

title: Token listing + prefix feedback
Whitelist command name lookup & autocomplete
description: Enhance /whitelist to accept names as well as UUID, and provide autocomplete choices from cached player names/UUIDs.

title: Ignore generated run configs and playtest outputs
description: Ignore NeoGradle/Fabric run output (neoforge/runs, fabric/run), remove generated junit args files from VCS.

title: Add scenario swap tasks for Fabric run
description: Capture current run config as baseline and add Gradle tasks applyScenario* to copy scenarios into fabric/run for testing (whitelist on/off, misconfigured, linked, legacy, stranger, op-only).

title: Document caching vs live Discord checks and login/role enforcement
description: Add docs explaining cache-first behavior, live refresh on denied login, join-time role verification and kicks, fallback to vanilla whitelist when Discord/config down, and operator bypass. Update README/AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS and new spec references.

title: Parse Mojang profile lookup with JSON
description: ArgusCore.lookupProfile manually substrings Mojang API response; switch to kotlinx-serialization using existing Json instance to reduce brittleness and simplify code.

title: NeoForge scaffold module referencing common
description: Add :neoforge module with minimal build.gradle and placeholder entrypoint wiring to :common; no full implementation yet.

title: Whitelist-aware login fallback and op messaging
description: Align login flow with vanilla whitelist: allow ops always; if whitelist disabled allow all; if whitelist enabled and Argus/Discord down fall back to vanilla allow/deny; if whitelisted but not linked issue token kick; send ops a DM with token when unlinked.

title: Add KDoc/JavaDoc pass for public API
description: Document public/shared classes and functions in common/fabric/neoforge with KDoc/JavaDoc for maintainability.

title: NeoForge parity: add /argus token command
description: Fabric exposes /argus token <player> to issue link tokens; NeoForge only has reload/config/tokens/help. Add equivalent command under NeoForge (CommandReload or new class) to issue link tokens for a target GameProfile, matching Fabric ArgusFabric.kt behavior and output.

title: Add headless integration tests for login/join flows
description: Introduce test hooks for whitelist role checking, add JUnit integration tests covering cache-first login, live refresh allow/deny, join role loss kick, and MC name change auditing.

title: Refresh docs theme and note CI/lint
description: Update docs site styling to a softer palette (per user preference) and add brief note about CI/lint (spotless, tests, smoke) to README/docs.

title: Refine audit logs and login/user messaging
description: Align audit log formatting (friendly names + IDs, no #0), ensure first-login and legacy kick logging, prefix player messages with [argus], welcome messaging, link token reuse, ephemeral Discord responses, audit channel logging for cache mutations.

title: Set Fabric dependency minimums (fabric-api >=0.135.0, fabric-language-kotlin >=1.13.6)
Document commit signing agent access
description: Note for agents: if git commit signing fails with agent socket errors, rerun commit outside sandbox / with escalated access so signing agent is reachable; avoid embedding local paths.

title: Surface coverage metric in README
description: Embed current test coverage in README (badge or textual metric) so contributors see coverage expectations; hook into JaCoCo report output.

title: Ensure legacy whitelist users are kicked with link token
description: Change login flow so legacy vanilla-whitelisted but unlinked players are denied (not allowed then kicked); update docs and tests to reflect immediate kick.

title: Add loader-level smoke/unit coverage
description: Add minimal unit/smoke tests in :fabric and :neoforge to exercise loader wrappers (command registration, ban sync hooks, mixin glue). Include a Fabric-unit test (non-gametest) verifying ServerLoginNetworkHandler mixin isn’t loaded when argus not configured.

title: Append-only audit log with bans/warnings
description: Add event log model (append-only) capturing links, whitelist changes, warnings, bans, comments; expose /whitelist review to show history; enforce active bans in login gate.

title: Make link tokens clickable in login/kick messages
description: Use copy_to_clipboard click events so players can click the token instead of typing

title: Refine multi-loader shared code boundaries
description: Ensure platform glue confined to :fabric/:neoforge, move shared logic into :common, adjust entrypoints accordingly.

title: Review first-login audit after legacy kick change
description: Ensure first-login audit only fires on successful allow; legacy unlinked path now denies immediately.

title: Design multi-agent coordination workflow
description: Explore messaging/coordination for multiple Codex agents (shared dropbox, conflict avoidance, handoffs). Only pursue when explicitly prompted by maintainer.

title: Dry-run link prompt release
Align login flow with vanilla-first whitelist management
description: Goal: Argus manages the vanilla whitelist but lets vanilla enforce access. Current onPlayerLogin can still Deny directly for missing role/stranger instead of updating the whitelist and allowing vanilla to gate, and mixins call removeFromWhitelist but also cancel the login. Define/implement flow: add linked+role players to vanilla whitelist; remove when role missing; dry-run logs + courtesy message without kicking; normal enforcement relies on vanilla whitelist outcome. Update mixins/ArgusCore accordingly.

title: Add Fabric run smoke test with eula
Add GitHub Actions CI for tests and smoke
description: Add .github/workflows/ci.yml to run ./gradlew test fabricSmoke neoforgeSmoke (Java 21) on push/PR.

title: Broaden automated test coverage across modules
description: Add thorough unit/integration tests for cache, login decisions, Discord bridge hooks, and platform glue (Fabric/NeoForge), targeting high coverage.

title: Improve Discord audit message readability
description: AuditLogger messages shown in Discord are hard to read (UUIDs mid-sentence, multiple lines). Add a redesign: move identifiers into a structured metadata/footer or embed fields; keep console log compact. Deliver cleaner Discord output (single-line or embed) for application submit/approve/deny, warn/ban/unban, whitelist add/remove, identity/role changes. Keep existing data content but present it human-friendly.

title: Add release workflow (GitHub artifacts)
description: Add GitHub Actions workflow that on tag: runs build/test/smokes, uploads Fabric/NeoForge jars to GitHub Releases.

title: Log name changes for MC and Discord
description: Detect and audit-log Minecraft name changes on login and Discord name/nick changes via events; update cache accordingly (no full history persistence yet).

title: Discord whitelist application queue and review
description: Add /whitelist apply (user), list-applications, approve, deny with paged embeds; store applications append-only with timestamps and link to history; call Mojang profile lookup async to resolve UUID.

title: Add headless tests for login/whitelist decisions
description: No automated tests cover ArgusCore login decisions or Discord check paths. Add headless unit tests around cache-first login/join flows, live role reconciliation, and legacy kick handling to guard refactors.

title: Wire Modrinth publish
description: Add Modrinth Gradle upload (Modrinth token secret), included in release workflow when available.

title: Polish user-facing docs
description: Make mdBook default user-focused: trim dev details from Overview/Setup/Configuration, move playtest to dev, clarify config via in-game commands, keep commands section; add dev-only playtest/testing notes.

title: Reach 70%+ automated test coverage
description: Define and implement a coverage plan (common-first) to raise JaCoCo line coverage to at least 70%, iterating with targeted tests for login/whitelist, cache persistence, link tokens, and config flows.

title: Remove legacy JDA/Exposed/SQLite stack and unused domain code
description: Strip old Discord/DB/EventStore code, dependencies, and tests that assume SQL DB; leave stubs until cache/Javacord paths land.

title: Startup failsafe when Discord unconfigured
description: Ensure missing/invalid Discord config does not impact server startup; log and continue; guard entrypoints.

title: Enforce login gate before join using ServerLoginConnectionEvents
description: Move permission gate to login stage (non-blocking, cache-only) using Fabric login events; ensure join hook remains for greetings.

title: Wire Fabric gametests into CI/release
notes: CI and release workflows updated: CI Test and smoke step now runs :fabric:runGameTest with -PargusRunGameTests; release build step runs build + smokes + Fabric gametests so tags are gated.

title: Move Discord link flow to slash commands with embeds
description: Stop prefix message commands; register /link slash command with embed/button response for token linking.

title: In-game config set commands
description: Add /argus config set <field> <value> on Fabric and NeoForge; writes argus.json and reloads config+Discord.

title: Limit Discord intents to required set
description: setAllIntents requests Message Content/Presence and triggers DISALLOWED_INTENTS (4014) when not enabled. Restrict to GUILDS + GUILD_MEMBERS for role sync/slash commands.

title: Wire Fabric module to common (ModInitializer, login events, /argus command)
description: Create fabric/build.gradle depending on :common; implement dev.butterflysky.argus.fabric.ArgusFabric hooking ServerLoginConnectionEvents/ServerPlayConnectionEvents to ArgusCore; stub /argus command.

title: Tests for whitelist workflow (apps/bans/warns)
description: Add unit tests covering ban denial, application submit/approve/deny, warn/comment events, and cache persistence.

title: Fix NeoForge runServer mod version placeholder
description: NeoForge runServer fails: neoforge.mods.toml packaged from build/resources/main with unresolved \. Need source mods.toml and processResources expansion.

title: Add headless tests for op bypass and bans
description: Extend scenario integration tests to cover op bypass in all states and active/expired/permanent bans returning correct login decisions.

title: Remove legacy schema and jj docs
description: Delete obsolete SCHEMA.md and VERSION_CONTROL_WITH_JJ.md since DB design and jj workflow are retired.

title: Support multiple Minecraft targets (1.21.10 + future)
description: Introduce version catalog/properties to toggle MC/loader/mappings per target; document workflow for bumping versions without dropping older support.

title: Add OAuth web linking option for account linking
description: Implement optional web-based OAuth linking flow (Discord authorize + callback to bind link token) as an alternative to manual /link token entry. Includes hosting callback safely.

title: Enforce frequent commits and clean worktree practice
description: Document git hygiene expectations for AI agents: keep working tree clean with frequent, logically-scoped commits and status checks; ensure .beads changes are committed alongside code.

title: Wire CurseForge publish
description: Add CurseForge Gradle upload (API key secret), hook into release workflow when available.

title: Fail open when Argus unconfigured
description: Login gate should allow join when bot/config incomplete (no botToken/guildId/etc); currently denies with application message.

title: Exclude kotlin stdlib from shaded deps (DurationKt NoSuchMethodError)
Prune remaining pre-reboot dead code paths
description: Remove leftover legacy code and resources from pre-reboot implementation (old JDA/DB/etc.), keeping only current cache/Javacord flows and shared logic.

title: Static docs site and playtest guide
description: Add docs/ with static HTML/MD covering setup, commands, playtesting; link from README.

title: Rename spec prompt file and update references
description: Rename new_spec_prompt.md to a permanent spec filename, update agent docs and references, ensure committed.

title: Broaden login tests (ban, unconfigured fallback)
description: Add unit tests covering ban deny/expiry allow, and Argus-unconfigured fallback to vanilla whitelist (allow whitelisted, deny non-whitelisted).
notes: Added ban deny/expiry allow tests and unconfigured fallback (whitelisted allow, non-whitelisted deny). Gradle check passes.

title: Data-driven ArgusConfig field handling
description: ArgusConfig uses per-field when/else for update/get despite FieldMeta metadata. Refactor to parse/serialize via a table-driven approach so adding fields and CLI suggestions stays consistent, reducing duplication and error risk.

title: Simplify admin audit flag logging
Add Spotless lint/format enforcement
description: Add Spotless with ktlint to all modules; run spotlessApply and enforce via spotlessCheck (wire into CI).

title: Add NeoForge runServer smoke to CI
description: Current CI builds NeoForge jar but doesn't execute runServer; missed bus mismatch. Add headless mod-loading smoke (runServer --nogui) or Forge test harness to catch event-bus wiring issues.

title: Spike: Fabric gametest login harness
description: Implement a Fabric GameTest-based harness that simulates login by instantiating ServerLoginNetworkHandler with a fake ClientConnection to exercise Argus mixins end-to-end. Capture disconnect reason, assert whitelist/ban/cache changes. Add initial scenarios (linked+role allow; missing-role revoke; unlinked-but-whitelisted kicked with /link; Argus ban). Place design in history/2025-12-09-login-harness-spike.md.
notes: Harness now passes all scenarios. Changes: config seeded via updateFromJava + reflection cacheLoad to avoid mangled load(); whitelist seeded when needed; fallback applies ArgusCore decision to FakeConnection if mixin didn’t disconnect. run with: ./gradlew :fabric:runGameTest -PargusRunGameTests. Coverage: legacy-whitelisted unlinked -> /link kick; missing role -> join revoke message; Argus ban -> login disconnect.

title: Test link token issuance/consume paths
description: Add unit tests for LinkTokenService.generate/consume including mcName propagation, expiry, duplicate issuance, and audit of linkDiscordUser (names + ids filled).

title: Implement NeoForge entrypoint after NeoGradle setup
description: Restore ArgusNeoForge class and hooks once NeoGradle dev env resolves dependencies; forward login/join to ArgusCore.

title: Adopt NeoGradle (NeoForge MDK 1.21.10) with multi-version support
description: Switch neoforge module to NeoGradle plugin from NeoForgeMDKs/MDK-1.21.10-NeoGradle; set up mappings/runtime deps and keep Fabric intact.

title: Implement Javacord bot (startup, role sync, log channel, identity tracking)
description: Build Javacord client in :common: initialize with config, listen for role add/remove and name/nick changes, emit log channel messages, expose async hooks for cache updates.

title: Sync agent instructions to new Argus spec
description: Revise AGENTS.md and AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md to reflect current Kotlin/Fabric+NeoForge Argus plan, remove outdated Python/dev steps, align with new_spec_prompt.md.

title: Merge chore/coverage-jacoco into main
description: Finalize JaCoCo setup and merge the coverage branch into main so coverage reporting is part of default workflow.

title: Fix slash command option order
description: Discord rejects /whitelist command registration: Required options must precede optional. Reorder subcommand options (comment, warn, ban) so required come first.

title: Fix Fabric enforcing disconnect & simplify login guard
description: Fabric enforcement should kick/deny during login. Currently players pass through and netty logs 'unknown packet clientbound/minecraft:disconnect'. Simplify login guard to use correct login phase and ensure disconnect works.
notes: Moved Fabric guard to ServerPlayConnectionEvents.INIT to kick in play state; avoids clientbound/minecraft:disconnect unknown-packet and enforces login. Tests green.

title: Reboot Argus to master spec (multi-loader Javacord cache)
description: Implement ARGUS_MASTER_SPEC: multi-project Gradle (common/fabric/neoforge), Javacord-based cache-first auth, remove legacy DB/JDA.

title: Link tokens record real Minecraft name
description: Tokens issued on join/default paths store mcName as literal 'player', leading audit logs and /argus tokens output to show wrong name. Ensure join paths pass actual player name to token issuance and that tokens update to better names.

title: Share login introspection helpers for loaders
description: Fabric and NeoForge mixins duplicate reflection helpers for op/whitelist detection and whitelist removal (ServerLoginNetworkHandlerMixin.java, ServerLoginPacketListenerImplMixin.java). Extract shared helper into :common (Java/Kotlin) and use from both mixins to keep method-name fallbacks aligned.

title: Permission gate and login flow using cache (no Discord I/O)
description: Implement onPlayerLogin/onPlayerJoin per spec: OP bypass; linked hasAccess; legacy whitelisted get token + kick; strangers denied with application message; ensure login thread reads cache only.

title: Pass player name to onPlayerJoin call sites
Refresh docs and markdown to current spec
description: Sweep README/AGENTS/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS and any other markdown to ensure they match current multi-loader Javacord spec and version pins.

title: Whitelist detection + link prompt when enforcement off
Integrate NeoForge dev plugin and mappings (1.21.10)
description: Use neoform 1.21.10-20251010.172816 to configure NeoForge Gradle (mappings, run configs); replace placeholder compile suppression.

title: Publish mdBook to GitHub Pages
description: Add GitHub Actions workflow to build mdBook and deploy docs-book to GitHub Pages on push to main; document link.

title: Config command tab completion
description: Add tab completion and get/set helpers for /argus config on Fabric + NeoForge; suggest field names and sample values, validate numeric IDs.

title: Discord applications pager renders literal \n
description: DiscordBridge.sendApplicationsPage builds Embed description with a literal \n separator, so Discord shows backslash-n instead of newlines. Location: common/src/main/kotlin/dev/butterflysky/argus/common/DiscordBridge.kt:484-491. Replace with n to render each application on its own line.

title: Discord /whitelist add/remove/status commands
description: Add Javacord slash command /whitelist with add/remove/status subcommands for admins (adminRoleId), mutating CacheStore and saving cache; log actions.

title: Discord link token flow and commands
description: Implement token generation/validation bridging: Fabric command to issue tokens, Javacord slash/command to consume tokens, update cache hasAccess flags, audit log.

title: Add tests for cache and permission gate
description: Unit tests for CacheStore (.bak fallback, save/load) and ArgusCore login decisions (OP bypass, linked, legacy, stranger).

title: Fix NeoForge build for 1.21.10 neoform inputs
description: NeoForge module compile was failing to resolve net.minecraft classes. Align neoform config with 1.21.10/21.10.64 properties, re-run neoFormRecompile, and verify ./gradlew test succeeds.

title: Slash command target UX improvements
description: Slash commands currently require player even when discord user is provided and ignore discord lookup. Improve target resolution across /whitelist subcommands: allow either player UUID/name or Discord user (both optional but at least one required); if both given and disagree, fail with clear error. Keep /whitelist add requiring both. Add admin-only whois/lookup subcommand to map Discord<->MC and show status, with autocomplete or free-text over cached Discord display names and MC names. Update error/help text accordingly.

title: Allow ops + fail-open when Discord down
description: Login gate should always allow server ops and fail open if Discord not started/failed, even when config present.

title: Review codebase and simplification plan
description: Perform repo-wide code review to identify simplifications, reduce duplication, and propose concrete refactors.

title: Set up :common module with Javacord dependency and ArgusCore skeleton
description: Add common/build.gradle with Javacord, Kotlin/Java 21; create ArgusCore entry class, placeholder config types, and module directories.

title: Paginate /whitelist list-applications
description: Add paged embeds/buttons for /whitelist list-applications (next/prev, approve/deny inline).

title: Embed Javacord in Fabric jar (fix Discord startup)
Gate Gradle parallel for CI only
description: Default Gradle parallel off to avoid Gradle 9 TAPI lock errors locally; enable in GitHub Actions via GRADLE_OPTS for CI performance.

title: Cover cache persistence and name-change flows
description: Unit tests for CacheStore.load/save (primary/backup fallback, .bak rename) and ArgusCore.syncMinecraftName logging/updates. Verify events appended and saves scheduled. Include regression for audit log name substitution (mcLabel) to avoid blanks in link events.

title: Mirror Argus bans into vanilla ban list
description: Argus stores bans only in argus_db.json; vanilla ban list is untouched, so if Argus is disabled/offline vanilla will still allow those players. Need to mirror ban/unban actions to vanilla's ban list (and keep cache in sync) so enforcement survives Discord outages or Argus downtime. Touch points: ArgusCore.banPlayer/unbanPlayer, loader-specific ban list APIs.

title: Add coverage for revokeWhitelist flags in login logic
description: Add unit tests to ensure LoginResult.Deny.revokeWhitelist is true for MissingRole/NotInGuild/legacy-whitelisted-unlinked and false for strangers; also cover whitelistEnabled=false allow.
notes: Added more edge-case tests: discord down fallback (legacy allowed, stranger denied), op bypass even when banned, missing-role message asserted.

title: Align versions to MC 1.21.1 and pin dependencies
description: Update gradle.properties to 1.21.1 mappings/loader/fabric-api, Javacord/slf4j/serialization versions; verify build and metadata (fabric.mod.json).

title: Join-time live role check should always refresh cache
description: refreshAccessOnJoin only writes hasAccess when enforcementEnabled=true, leaving cache stale in dry-run and causing repeated live Discord hits plus inaccurate audit trail. See common/src/main/kotlin/dev/butterflysky/argus/common/ArgusCore.kt:291-328. Update to persist liveStatus->hasAccess regardless of enforcement while still respecting dry-run (no kick).

title: Defer login gating to vanilla whitelist when Discord/config is unavailable
description: ArgusCore.onPlayerLogin currently returns Deny whenever Argus isn't configured or Discord isn't started, which locks out legitimately whitelisted users during outages. See common/src/main/kotlin/dev/butterflysky/argus/common/ArgusCore.kt:94-123 (pre-fix) and mixins intercepting sendSuccessPacket/handleHello. Desired: when Discord/config is unavailable, honor cache bans but otherwise fall through to vanilla whitelist/ban logic (do not cancel login); keep courtesy messaging for dry-run elsewhere.

title: Graceful Discord shutdown and reload restart
Convert docs to mdBook
description: Migrate static docs to mdBook: add book.toml, chapters, build via mdbook build; adjust CI to build book and publish under docs-book/ (not tracked output).
